title: Bug 13189 - Refactoring deleting fields context menu is overridden by message dialog
description: 20020409I on LinuxMotif and w2k:1. Setup JUnit2.
OB: When attempting to delete fields using the context menu, no context menu is shown. Instead, a message dialog appears asking if I want to delete the getter/setter as well.
EB: I expect to see the context menu when attempting to delete fields, and to be able to delete fields without being prompted about the getter/setter.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Setup JUnit. 2. Attempt to delete fields using the context menu.
